https://tmrev.io/movie/338679-Beep: A Documentary History of Game Sound 2022-11-27
xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/338679-Beep: A Documentary History of Game Sound 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/px6yUISNKaPRWXt2eaavEW2zq51.jpg A documentary of game sound from the Victorian arcades through to today, with a special focus on video game sound, but also including mechanical games and pinball. Beep is a feature film, but also a series of webisodes and DVD extras, a book, and a collection of resources found on the Beep website. Beep: A Documentary History of Game Sound
